PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PipeSegmentTypeCulvert
PropertySetDef.Definition: Covered channel or large pipe that forms a watercourse below ground level, usually under a road or railway (BS6100).

PropertyDef.Name: ClearDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The clear depth of the culvert.

PropertyDef.Name: InternalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The internal width of the culvert.
